code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EDACards=()=>{const[scenarios,setScenarios]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch(process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/eda_scenarios.json').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setScenarios(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"eda-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDD0D Exploratory Data Analysis Scenarios"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"eda-grid",children:scenarios.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"eda-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Target:"})," ",item.target]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Type:"})," ",item.type]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"eda-actions",children:[item.dataset&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:item.dataset,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"\uD83D\uDCC2 Dataset"}),item.notebook&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:item.notebook,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"\uD83D\uDCC2 Notebook"}),item.report&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:`/reports/${item.report}`,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"\uD83D\uDCCA AutoEDA"})]})]},idx))})]});};export default EDACards;
